post:
Quite some time has passed since the last release of Billr, and the product has once again been improved significantly and I would like to invite you all to check it out. 

Whilst still in its infancy, this version lays the foundation for a lot of big things, including modules, a helpdesk, templating, project/time tracking, invoicing and very basic book keeping.

I'm looking to get as many people on board as possible, to test the product in their environment and steer the development over the coming months to produce something that really ticks all the right boxes, just as this version incorporates nearly all of the feedback I've had previously.

To kickstart things, I'm offering a nice reduction on a prerelease owned licence between now and the release date of 2.1 BETA, which is currently scheduled for tomorrow.

**Links**
Home: http://www.getbillr.com/
Features: http://www.getbillr.com/features/
Screenshots: http://www.getbillr.com/screenshots/ (were taken in development)
Feedback: http://help.getbillr.com/

**Offer**
£59.99 for an owned licence with 6 months of support & upgrades.
SUS renewable at £10/6 months
Order Link: https://secure.sysadmin.co.uk/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=17&promocode=PRERELEASE

The promotion will expire just before the launch, when a demo will also be made available.
